name: Grow (itch) (Leshiy, fannd_nl)
description:
In a forgotten clearing deep in the forest, an old man lives. No one goes that far, he hasn't seen people in a long time. But how did he get here? And why?  Heaven knows. He grows mushrooms and treasures each one, keeping them in his hut. Come closer and look. There a new one grows. 

How to grow mushroom instruction:

Listen closely and answer it's questions.  Take it seriosly. 

Go find the answers in the background. And give answer in a timely manner, as long as they are relevant.

_______

Art + photobash and AI art used
